prefix: an object that is used to call the entitiy
name: the name of the entitity
type: the data type of the entitiy

parameters.name: the name of the parameter
parameters.type: the data type of the parameter
parameters.default: the default value of the parameter
parameters.parameters: an array of parameters used to represent an options object with deafults

returns: the return value of the entitity if it returns
